My Creative Process

With over 5.3 years of experience in developing professional web applications which include Front-End designing and hand coding with solid proficiency in usability, web and client application using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Context API, Redux and GraphQL as well as backend development using Django REST, Express.js & Node
